Strands of Faith Amla Mask

Brand: 0

Category: Mask

Ingredients: Aqua (Water), Amla Powder (Phyllanthus emblica), Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil*, Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate (Non-Sulfate Detangling Agent), Ulmus Fulva Bark Extract (Slippery Elm)*, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sorbic Acid
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
